io.soliton.protobuf.quartz

Class QuartzClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.soliton.protobuf.quartz.QuartzClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Client

    public class QuartzClient
extends Object
implements Client
    An RPC client which encodes method calls in Envelope messages and uses an HTTP transport.
    Author:
    Julien Silland (julien@soliton.io)

      Configurable builder for instances of QuartzClient.

        public static QuartzClient.Builder newClient(HostAndPort remoteAddress)

        public <O extends Message> ListenableFuture<O> encodeMethodCall(ClientMethod<O> method,

        Specified by:

        This operation is synchronous.
